TopicTitle: All Airstream Protective Shell 'Unstage Fairing' not in the RMB (Right Mouse Button) menu.

Articles.Content:
Kerbaldad's son has a question to ask:

Quote

I can't find the 'Unstage Fairing' Button in the RMB menu. I use KSP 1.10.1

I have watched other people's tutorials and they have the option, although some of them are using older versions.

Here is what I see:

(I have mods installed and I can't find it but I noticed it before I got those mods)

Thanks for your help.
Maybe you need to activate "advanced tweakables" in the settings.
And finding the 'Advanced Tweakables' setting has to be done outside the VAB.   From the short menu you get with the 'Esc' key, then choosing 'Settings', it is about halfway down the long list.
